summary: This is a Bank of America credit card statement for an account ending in 5463, covering the billing period July 15 to August 14, 2019. It shows a foreign transaction in Birmingham, UK, and details the account's balance, fees, and credit terms. The document is part of the Epstein case files, suggesting it is a financial record related to the investigation.

events.title: Foreign Purchase in Birmingham
events.description: A purchase was made using the credit card in Birmingham, Great Britain (GBR), posting on August 12, 2019.

locations: Wilmington, DE 19886-5019 (Bank of America mailing address)
keyFacts: A Bank of America credit card (account ref. 5463) was used for a transaction in Birmingham, UK, during the billing period ending August 14, 2019.
The statement shows a foreign transaction fee of $22.60, indicating international use of the card.
The document identifier EFTA00123619 links it to the Epstein case files, suggesting it is a financial record obtained during the investigation.
